DOC.detailed_description: 200 child age 4-12 year recruit pediatrician general practitioner allocate preventive treatment either Echinaforce Junior tablet Vitamin C. Children take 3 x 1 tablet per day period 2 month follow 1 week treatment break intermediate study visit ( V2 ) . Thereafter child continue preventive Treatment another 2 month , follow exclusion visit ( V3 ) . Parents require contact study coordinator occurrence acute respiratory Symptoms initiate symptom record via internet-based e-diary . On day 1 - 3 episode parent sample nasal secretion , analysed common respiratory agent .
